What \w then|strong="H7200"\w*? \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* dismayed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w turning|strong="H6437"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w backs|strong="H0268"\w*, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* \w ones|strong="H1368"\w* slain: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* apace, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*: \w terror|strong="H4032"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
